comment.author: 39386391@N08
comment._content: Você é convidado para adicionar sua bela foto em nosso grupo / You are invited to add your beautiful photo in our groups: Nossas Vidas / Nosso Mundo - Our Life / Our World Benvindo/ Welcome! Coloca 1/ comenta 2, por favor! Post 1/ comment 2, please!

comment.author: 53587910@N05
comment._content: Ah yes, I remember this well. As a kid, we went to the "Junior Museum" all the time, all I wanted to do was just hang out inside this caboose. I remember it being in a different position than this, but it would have been 5-6 years after this shot was taken.
